title: Awakened
description: A tattoo is for life, but what if its ink marks you for death? Tattoo artist Ivy Gillis does killer tattoos—literally. They’re coming to life and also to Ivy’s defense. She’s unaware of the link with her art and her magical past. Just as she begins to discover the truth and the mystery surrounding her upbringing, she finds that she's falling in love with two very different men. But as her passion fuels magic she cannot control, the results start to become deadly. A Tangled Ivy Tattoo Fantasy.
author: Shirley Bourget
